title: Proctor an Accommodated Exam
description: An agent at the disability services testing center must proctor an exam for a student who has an accommodation to use a text-to-speech reader.

tasks.description: Verify the student's identity and the specific accommodations for this exam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Proctor confirms the student and the 'text-to-speech software' accommodation.

tasks.description: Set up the student at a computer with the approved software and the digital version of the exam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Proctor successfully logs the student into the testing environment.

tasks.description: Monitor the student during the exam to ensure compliance with academic integrity policies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Proctor observes the student without incident.
